USE LogicalDWH;
GO

CREATE SCHEMA iss;

CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [iss] WITH (LOCATION = 'abfss://iss-position@datalakeytaletu.dfs.core.windows.net/', CREDENTIAL = [SynapseIdentity]);
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE iss.cetas_position
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'cetas-output/parquet/',
	DATA_SOURCE = [iss],
	FILE_FORMAT = [parquet]
	) AS
SELECT
    b.[timestamp]
    ,b.[message] 
    ,c.*
FROM (
    SELECT 
        jsonContent
    FROM
        OPENROWSET(
            BULK 'https://datalakeytaletu.dfs.core.windows.net/iss-position/raw/serverless/json/**',
            FORMAT = 'CSV',
            FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
            FIELDTERMINATOR ='0x0b',
            ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0b'
        )
        WITH (
            jsonContent varchar(MAX)
        ) AS [result]
    ) AS a
    CROSS APPLY
    OPENJSON(a.jsonContent) WITH (
        [timestamp]     BIGINT
        ,[message]      VARCHAR(20)
        ,[iss_position] nvarchar(max) AS JSON
    ) AS b
    CROSS APPLY
    OPENJSON(b.[iss_position]) WITH (
        latitude    VARCHAR(20)
        ,longitude  VARCHAR(20)
    ) AS c;

USE LogicalDWH;
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [parquet] WITH (FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET);
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [sanfranciscofireworkers] WITH (LOCATION = 'abfss://sanfranciscofireworkersdata@datalakeytaletu.dfs.core.windows.net/sanfrancisco/raw/', CREDENTIAL = [SynapseIdentity]);
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE ldw.call_2020_agg
	WITH (
	LOCATION = '2020/',
	DATA_SOURCE = [sanfranciscofireworkers],
	FILE_FORMAT = [parquet]
	) AS
SELECT
    DATENAME(MONTH, dateTime) AS monthname
    ,dataType
    ,dataSubtype
    ,subcategory
    ,COUNT(*) AS num
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://datalakeytaletu.dfs.core.windows.net/sanfranciscofireworkersdata/sanfrancisco/parquet/year=2020/month=*/**',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
GROUP BY DATENAME(MONTH, dateTime), dataType, dataSubtype, subcategory;

SELECT
    COUNT(*) AS num
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://datalakeytaletu.dfs.core.windows.net/sanfranciscofireworkersdata/sanfrancisco/csv/year=2001/month=01/**',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = '|',
        FIELDQUOTE = '"',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) WITH (
        dataType            VARCHAR(1000)
        ,dataSubtype        VARCHAR(1000)
        ,dateTime           DATETIME2
        ,category           VARCHAR(1000)
        ,subcategory        VARCHAR(1000)
        ,status             VARCHAR(1000)
        ,address            VARCHAR(1000)
        ,latitude           FLOAT
        ,longitude          FLOAT
        ,source             VARCHAR(1000)
        ,extendedProperties VARCHAR(1000)
    ) AS [result];

SELECT
    COUNT(*) AS num
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://datalakeytaletu.dfs.core.windows.net/sanfranciscofireworkersdata/sanfrancisco/csv/year=2001/month=01/**',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = '|',
        FIELDQUOTE = '"',
        PARSER_VERSION = '1.0'
    ) WITH (
        dataType            VARCHAR(1000)
        ,dataSubtype        VARCHAR(1000)
        ,dateTime           DATETIME2
        ,category           VARCHAR(1000)
        ,subcategory        VARCHAR(1000)
        ,status             VARCHAR(1000)
        ,address            VARCHAR(1000)
        ,latitude           FLOAT
        ,longitude          FLOAT
        ,source             VARCHAR(1000)
        ,extendedProperties VARCHAR(1000)
    ) AS [result];

-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    TOP 1 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://datalakeytaletu.dfs.core.windows.net/yellowtaxi/nyc/csv/puYear=2010/puMonth=01/**',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = '|',
        FIELDQUOTE = '"',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) AS [result];

/*
Statement ID: {E88931D2-0017-4D92-AA26-23A19FCEF1E2} | Query hash: 0xCC5EFD1C8FDFE143 | Distributed request ID: {D313A941-724D-4624-BA3B-221FA315862D}. Total size of data scanned is 3 megabytes, total size of data moved is 1 megabytes, total size of data written is 0 megabytes.
(1 record affected)
*/

-----------------------------------------------------

SELECT
    paymentType
    ,count(*) as num
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://datalakeytaletu.dfs.core.windows.net/yellowtaxi/nyc/csv/puYear=2010/puMonth=01/**',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = '|',
        FIELDQUOTE = '"',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) AS [result]
GROUP BY paymentType
ORDER BY num DESC;

/*
Statement ID: {B00240AD-EE3C-41EB-9106-1BB3B9D4D057} | Query hash: 0x9F2693848479C4DF | Distributed request ID: {5DDC56E8-9B43-44C1-A5F6-7402C626D321}. Total size of data scanned is 3673 megabytes, total size of data moved is 1 megabytes, total size of data written is 0 megabytes.
(6 records affected)
*/

-----------------------------------------------------

SELECT TOP 100000
    tpepPickupDateTime
    ,paymentType
    ,passengerCount
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://datalakeytaletu.dfs.core.windows.net/yellowtaxi/nyc/csv/puYear=2010/puMonth=01/**',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = '|',
        FIELDQUOTE = '"',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) AS [result];

/*
Statement ID: {DC781DF1-C33E-4315-B79F-8A2AD4A7A984} | Query hash: 0x653D0D0BEBDE4F4A | Distributed request ID: {E72FAA28-A95B-4AB9-91FC-7F398CD09B73}. Total size of data scanned is 70 megabytes, total size of data moved is 9 megabytes, total size of data written is 0 megabytes.
(5000 records affected)
*/

-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    TOP 1 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://datalakeytaletu.dfs.core.windows.net/sanfranciscofireworkersdata/sanfrancisco/csv/year=2001/month=01/**',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = '|',
        FIELDQUOTE = '"',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) AS [result];


/*
Statement ID: {CC3C6A40-54C6-4628-A1D0-84FFDBBFF21E} | Query hash: 0xF41C5FA9D03F2608 | Distributed request ID: {53BB2410-07D5-4AA3-8787-D3E88212F4F1}. Total size of data scanned is 1 megabytes, total size of data moved is 1 megabytes, total size of data written is 0 megabytes.
(1 record affected)
*/

-----------------------------------------------------

SELECT
    subcategory
    ,count(*) as num
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://datalakeytaletu.dfs.core.windows.net/sanfranciscofireworkersdata/sanfrancisco/csv/year=2001/month=01/**',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = '|',
        FIELDQUOTE = '"',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    )  
    -- WITH (
    --     dataType            VARCHAR(1000)
    --     ,dataSubtype        VARCHAR(1000)
    --     ,dateTime           DATETIME2
    --     ,category           VARCHAR(1000)
    --     ,subcategory        VARCHAR(1000)
    --     ,status             VARCHAR(1000)
    --     ,address            VARCHAR(1000)
    --     ,latitude           FLOAT
    --     ,longitude          FLOAT
    --     ,source             VARCHAR(1000)
    --     ,extendedProperties VARCHAR(1000)
    -- ) 
    AS [result]
GROUP BY subcategory
ORDER BY num DESC;

/*
Statement ID: {453947E4-6AAD-464B-82EC-514D27A8DF8C} | Query hash: 0x3D802392914EB552 | Distributed request ID: {3086A895-CC5C-49DF-B786-D7E7DD25CEBE}. Total size of data scanned is 5 megabytes, total size of data moved is 1 megabytes, total size of data written is 0 megabytes.
(21 records affected)
*/

-----------------------------------------------------

SELECT
    subcategory
    ,dateTime
    ,address
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://datalakeytaletu.dfs.core.windows.net/sanfranciscofireworkersdata/sanfrancisco/csv/year=2001/month=01/**',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = '|',
        FIELDQUOTE = '"',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) AS [result];

/*Statement ID: {ED699EC4-6C9F-44EB-A6F2-85D5BD429F51} | Query hash: 0xBDEC233069A302C | Distributed request ID: {AD22B674-DD6A-44A3-A287-EBB8E01068BB}. Total size of data scanned is 3 megabytes, total size of data moved is 1 megabytes, total size of data written is 0 megabytes.
(5021 records affected)
*/

-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://datalakeytaletu.dfs.core.windows.net/sanfranciscofireworkersdata/sanfrancisco/delta/',
        FORMAT = 'DELTA'
    ) AS [result];

/*
https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/synapse-analytics/sql/develop-tables-statistics
*/

----- usare database per Serverless 

USE LogicalDWH;
GO

----- creare formato del file (in questo caso la fonte dato e' gia' stata creata)

CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [csv_taxi] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT ,
	       FORMAT_OPTIONS (FIELD_TERMINATOR = '|', FIRST_ROW = 2, USE_TYPE_DEFAULT = FALSE)
		   );
GO

----- creare external table

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE taxi.payment_2015_csv
	WITH (
	LOCATION = '2015/',
	DATA_SOURCE = [nyctaxi],
	FILE_FORMAT = [csv_taxi]
	) AS
SELECT
    tpepPickupDateTime
    ,paymentType
    ,totalAmount
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://datalakeytaletu.dfs.core.windows.net/yellowtaxi/nyc/csv/puYear=2015/**',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = '|',
        FIELDQUOTE = '"',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) AS [result];
-- no statistiche create
-----

SELECT top 1000 * FROM taxi.payment_2015_csv
----- statistiche non create per questa query
-----
-- lancio 1
SELECT
    DATENAME(MONTH, tpepPickupDateTime) AS monthName
    ,paymentType
    ,AVG(totalAmount) avgTotalAmount
    ,count(*) as numRows
FROM taxi.payment_2015_csv
GROUP BY paymentType, DATENAME(MONTH, tpepPickupDateTime)
/*
Statement ID: {7CF6E133-3A79-4AC9-AC0D-00ED639278AF} | Query hash: 0x5719087CDDA024DF | Distributed request ID: {FDBA24F2-0A52-4AD6-B2FB-E51653220C67}. Total size of data scanned is 6728 megabytes, total size of data moved is 1 megabytes, total size of data written is 0 megabytes.
(59 records affected)

Total execution time: 00:00:23.797
*/
-- creato solo Internal Cardinality Query (7 sec)

-- lancio 2
SELECT
    DATENAME(MONTH, tpepPickupDateTime) AS monthName
    ,paymentType
    ,AVG(totalAmount) avgTotalAmount
    ,count(*) as numRows
FROM taxi.payment_2015_csv
GROUP BY paymentType, DATENAME(MONTH, tpepPickupDateTime)
/*
Statement ID: {0819995E-848B-4B3C-94BA-1A7F2C9E7B82} | Query hash: 0x5719087CDDA024DF | Distributed request ID: {8A4A2EB2-6F3E-45B7-B28A-93D0EDB24785}. Total size of data scanned is 6728 megabytes, total size of data moved is 1 megabytes, total size of data written is 0 megabytes.
(59 records affected)

Total execution time: 00:00:17.429
*/
-- non ha creato nulla. NOTA: 23.7 - 17.4 = circa 7 secondi (overhead della Internal Cardinality Query)

-- creo statistiche:
CREATE STATISTICS puDateTime_Stats
ON taxi.payment_2015_csv(tpepPickupDateTime)
WITH FULLSCAN, NORECOMPUTE
GO

CREATE STATISTICS paymentType_Stats
ON taxi.payment_2015_csv(paymentType)
WITH FULLSCAN, NORECOMPUTE
GO

-- lancio 3
SELECT
    DATENAME(MONTH, tpepPickupDateTime) AS monthName
    ,paymentType
    ,AVG(totalAmount) avgTotalAmount
    ,count(*) as numRows
FROM taxi.payment_2015_csv
GROUP BY paymentType, DATENAME(MONTH, tpepPickupDateTime)
/*
Statement ID: {70F00262-3658-4E0E-8E07-5F1F09A77756} | Query hash: 0x5719087CDDA024DF | Distributed request ID: {5DD9F88A-5608-44DC-BF61-8799A9CAE8BC}. Total size of data scanned is 6728 megabytes, total size of data moved is 3585 megabytes, total size of data written is 0 megabytes.
(59 records affected)

Total execution time: 00:00:28.146
*/

-- lancio 4
SELECT
    DATENAME(MONTH, tpepPickupDateTime) AS monthName
    ,paymentType
    ,AVG(totalAmount) avgTotalAmount
    ,count(*) as numRows
FROM taxi.payment_2015_csv
GROUP BY paymentType, DATENAME(MONTH, tpepPickupDateTime)
/*
Statement ID: {13F23D57-779D-4E9C-8B54-1B44ABEC4A9C} | Query hash: 0x5719087CDDA024DF | Distributed request ID: {F7D71C00-F176-4C3B-AC0B-A79C87836463}. Total size of data scanned is 6728 megabytes, total size of data moved is 3585 megabytes, total size of data written is 0 megabytes.
(59 records affected)

Total execution time: 00:00:23.698
*/

-- Creazione di una external table senza il metodo CETAS
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE iss.ext_position (
	[timestamp] bigint,
	[message] varchar(20),
	[latitude] varchar(20),
	[longitude] varchar(20)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'raw/serverless/parquet/**',
	DATA_SOURCE = [iss],
	FILE_FORMAT = [parquet]
	);
GO

-- Il lancio della query, mi fa ritrovare i nuovi record (ho specificato solo la sorgente al momento della creazione)
SELECT * FROM iss.ext_position;

SELECT
    subcategory
    ,COUNT(*) AS num
    ,CAST(dateTime AS DATE) as [date]
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://datalakeytaletu.dfs.core.windows.net/sanfranciscofireworkersdata/sanfrancisco/delta/',
        FORMAT = 'DELTA'
    ) AS [result]
WHERE CAST(dateTime AS DATE) = '20010101'
GROUP BY subcategory, CAST(dateTime AS DATE);
-- Total size of data scanned is 530 megabytes, Total execution time: 00:01:59.655

SELECT TOP 3
    [year]
    ,subcategory
    ,COUNT(*) AS num
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://datalakeytaletu.dfs.core.windows.net/sanfranciscofireworkersdata/sanfrancisco/nonPartitionedParquet/**',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
WHERE [year] = '2001'
GROUP BY subcategory, [year]
ORDER BY num DESC

-- 1 folder con tutti i file
SELECT
    TOP 1 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://datalakeytaletu.dfs.core.windows.net/sanfranciscofireworkersdata/sanfrancisco/nonPartitionedParquet/*.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result];

-- Total size of data scanned is 49 megabytes, Total execution time: 00:00:08.246

-- 22 cartelle (years) x 12 mesi (month) x 30/31 giorni (day_month)
SELECT
    TOP 1 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://datalakeytaletu.dfs.core.windows.net/sanfranciscofireworkersdata/sanfrancisco/parquet/*/*/*/*.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result];

-- Total size of data scanned is 1 megabytes, Total execution time: 00:01:12.860

SELECT
    subcategory
    ,COUNT(*) AS num
    ,CAST(dateTime AS DATE) as [date]
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://datalakeytaletu.dfs.core.windows.net/sanfranciscofireworkersdata/sanfrancisco/deltaoptimize/',
        FORMAT = 'DELTA'
    ) AS [result]
WHERE CAST(dateTime AS DATE) = '20010101'
GROUP BY subcategory, CAST(dateTime AS DATE);
-- Total size of data scanned is 148 megabytes, Total execution time: 00:00:17.255

-- no partition
SELECT
    paymentType
    ,count(*) as num
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://datalakeytaletu.dfs.core.windows.net/yellowtaxi/nyc/nonPartitionedParquet/**',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
WHERE CONVERT(DATE, tpepPickupDateTime) = '20100101' 
GROUP BY paymentType
ORDER BY num DESC;

/*
Statement ID: {8D11681C-846B-4AC3-B11E-22D756CAAD56} | Query hash: 0x65FDC93AAB0473B9 | Distributed request ID: {64AE41C8-0B4B-474D-8FB9-A33386C38AFB}. Total size of data scanned is 19625 megabytes, total size of data moved is 1 megabytes, total size of data written is 0 megabytes.
(4 records affected)

Total execution time: 00:01:03.846
*/

-- year month partition
SELECT
    paymentType
    ,count(*) as num
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://datalakeytaletu.dfs.core.windows.net/yellowtaxi/nyc/delta/puYear=2010/puMonth=01/**',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
WHERE puDay = '01'
GROUP BY paymentType
ORDER BY num DESC;

/*
Statement ID: {96827B68-F4E9-4D1D-AD36-EFD294A4B1EF} | Query hash: 0x39A2453CDE02D22F | Distributed request ID: {35025942-1EFD-40EA-BF99-218F138ED0A6}. Total size of data scanned is 32 megabytes, total size of data moved is 1 megabytes, total size of data written is 0 megabytes.
(4 records affected)

Total execution time: 00:00:09.404
*/

-- year month day partition
SELECT
    paymentType
    ,count(*) as num
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://datalakeytaletu.dfs.core.windows.net/yellowtaxi/nyc/parquet/puYear=2010/puMonth=01/puDay=01/**',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
GROUP BY paymentType
ORDER BY num DESC;

/*
Statement ID: {FF406F92-0562-493F-8384-D3073C94D84F} | Query hash: 0x9F2693848479C4DF | Distributed request ID: {B2E77C73-DF38-4DA0-85ED-F5AD058650B1}. Total size of data scanned is 2 megabytes, total size of data moved is 1 megabytes, total size of data written is 0 megabytes.
(4 records affected)

Total execution time: 00:00:09.611
*/

-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    TOP 1 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://datalakeytaletu.dfs.core.windows.net/yellowtaxi/nyc/parquet/puYear=2010/puMonth=01/**',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result];

/*
Statement ID: {A7C65281-D86A-4C74-B287-DAD11CE942CA} | Query hash: 0xCC5EFD1C8FDFE143 | Distributed request ID: {61ABC47A-443E-4B3B-ACE7-742E3AECCEE7}. Total size of data scanned is 10 megabytes, total size of data moved is 1 megabytes, total size of data written is 0 megabytes.
(1 record affected)
*/

-----------------------------------------------

SELECT
    paymentType
    ,count(*) as num
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://datalakeytaletu.dfs.core.windows.net/yellowtaxi/nyc/parquet/puYear=2010/puMonth=01/**',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
GROUP BY paymentType
ORDER BY num DESC;

/*
Statement ID: {7884FD04-DAB9-43C9-BFEC-F474974014AC} | Query hash: 0x9F2693848479C4DF | Distributed request ID: {3CB1C784-9188-4E46-8BC9-0365726EA1D2}. Total size of data scanned is 51 megabytes, total size of data moved is 1 megabytes, total size of data written is 0 megabytes.
(6 records affected)
*/

-----------------------------------------------

SELECT TOP 100000
    tpepPickupDateTime
    ,paymentType
    ,passengerCount
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://datalakeytaletu.dfs.core.windows.net/yellowtaxi/nyc/parquet/puYear=2010/puMonth=01/**',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result];

/*
Statement ID: {68749C7D-6ABC-4096-A451-3EE60A252F6A} | Query hash: 0x653D0D0BEBDE4F4A | Distributed request ID: {2092BBB8-8BCF-4740-9AB2-A3A79AAD4D58}. Total size of data scanned is 8 megabytes, total size of data moved is 10 megabytes, total size of data written is 0 megabytes.
(5000 records affected)
*/

-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    TOP 1 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://datalakeytaletu.dfs.core.windows.net/sanfranciscofireworkersdata/sanfrancisco/parquet/year=2001/month=01/**',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result];

/*
Statement ID: {F8BC50F2-8CDD-42E9-BFB6-A068C9271284} | Query hash: 0xF41C5FA9D03F2608 | Distributed request ID: {F2C188D8-D2D1-42A6-AC4C-FE620E552B13}. Total size of data scanned is 1 megabytes, total size of data moved is 1 megabytes, total size of data written is 0 megabytes.
(1 record affected)
*/

-----------------------------------------------

SELECT
    subcategory
    ,count(*) as num
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://datalakeytaletu.dfs.core.windows.net/sanfranciscofireworkersdata/sanfrancisco/parquet/year=2001/month=01/**',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
GROUP BY subcategory
ORDER BY num DESC;

/*
Statement ID: {5735D31F-971A-4B8A-BDC0-C80AB3558CF6} | Query hash: 0x3D802392914EB552 | Distributed request ID: {F67C32A1-9163-4E70-93CF-067AAFBDA0AC}. Total size of data scanned is 4 megabytes, total size of data moved is 1 megabytes, total size of data written is 0 megabytes.
(21 records affected)
*/

-----------------------------------------------

SELECT
    subcategory
    ,dateTime
    ,address
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://datalakeytaletu.dfs.core.windows.net/sanfranciscofireworkersdata/sanfrancisco/parquet/year=2001/month=01/**',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]

/*
Statement ID: {EB94DD3F-6C4F-41E0-8E50-1AFB261D6CBC} | Query hash: 0xBDEC233069A302C | Distributed request ID: {CFA5D8C1-3604-487B-B191-A78F8EB979F3}. Total size of data scanned is 2 megabytes, total size of data moved is 1 megabytes, total size of data written is 0 megabytes.
(5021 records affected)
*/

SELECT TOP 3
    CAST([result].filepath(1) AS SMALLINT) AS [year]
    ,subcategory
    ,COUNT(*) AS num
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://datalakeytaletu.dfs.core.windows.net/sanfranciscofireworkersdata/sanfrancisco/parquet/year=*/**',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
WHERE CAST([result].filepath(1) AS SMALLINT) = '2001'
GROUP BY subcategory, CAST([result].filepath(1) AS SMALLINT)
ORDER BY num DESC

SELECT TOP 3
    [result].filepath(1) AS [year]
    ,subcategory
    ,COUNT(*) AS num
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://datalakeytaletu.dfs.core.windows.net/sanfranciscofireworkersdata/sanfrancisco/parquet/year=*/**',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
WHERE [result].filepath(1) = '2001'
GROUP BY subcategory, [result].filepath(1)
ORDER BY num DESC

SELECT * 
FROM iss.cetas_position

-- Creare una external table con metodo CETAS non vuol dire che continua a prendere dati (nuovi che entrano) dalla posizione di sorgente e non ne crea ulteriori nella posizione di destinazione.
-- Quindi sto interrogando i dati che ho generato AL MOMENTO della creazione della external table con metodo CETAS

-- external table
SELECT * FROM taxi.rate_2010_agg
/*
Statement ID: {3FE2F3E5-BAE4-424A-A449-57BDBF90F49C} | Query hash: 0x45AEFC68D5DEC3D4 | Distributed request ID: {057806A7-165A-4993-969E-B541D102A43B}. Total size of data scanned is 1 megabytes, total size of data moved is 1 megabytes, total size of data written is 0 megabytes.
(35 records affected)

Total execution time: 00:00:05.390
*/

-- external table
SELECT * FROM ldw.call_2020_agg
-- Total size of data scanned is 1 megabytes, Total execution time: 00:00:05.418

-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    b.[timestamp]
    ,b.[message] 
    ,c.*
FROM (
    SELECT 
        jsonContent
    FROM
        OPENROWSET(
            BULK 'https://datalakeytaletu.dfs.core.windows.net/iss-position/raw/serverless/json/**',
            FORMAT = 'CSV',
            FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
            FIELDTERMINATOR ='0x0b',
            ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0b'
        )
        WITH (
            jsonContent varchar(MAX)
        ) AS [result]
    ) AS a
    CROSS APPLY
    OPENJSON(a.jsonContent) WITH (
        [timestamp]     BIGINT
        ,[message]      VARCHAR(20)
        ,[iss_position] nvarchar(max) AS JSON
    ) AS b
    CROSS APPLY
    OPENJSON(b.[iss_position]) WITH (
        latitude    VARCHAR(20)
        ,longitude  VARCHAR(20)
    ) AS c;

-- Ogni lancio della query (1 lancio al minuto) si aggiunge una riga, perche' entra un nuovo json dalla pipeline

SELECT
    rateCodeId
    ,SUM(CAST(passengerCount AS BIGINT)) AS PassengerCount
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://datalakeytaletu.dfs.core.windows.net/yellowtaxi/nyc/delta/puYear=2010/**',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
GROUP BY rateCodeId;
/*
Statement ID: {23600A17-64CA-4473-BC27-162855F0EDB8} | Query hash: 0x2D8FE73BE2B45DCA | Distributed request ID: {4FCA6E01-A195-43EA-A0BD-061D847A6636}. Total size of data scanned is 95 megabytes, total size of data moved is 1 megabytes, total size of data written is 0 megabytes.
(35 records affected)

Total execution time: 00:00:24.373
*/

-- query da riutilizzare
SELECT
    DATENAME(MONTH, dateTime) AS monthname
    ,dataType
    ,dataSubtype
    ,subcategory
    ,COUNT(*) AS num
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://datalakeytaletu.dfs.core.windows.net/sanfranciscofireworkersdata/sanfrancisco/parquet/year=2020/month=*/**',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
GROUP BY DATENAME(MONTH, dateTime), dataType, dataSubtype, subcategory;
--  Total size of data scanned is 54 megabytes, Total execution time: 00:00:43.610

-- lanciare 3/4 volte
SELECT
    DATENAME(MONTH, tpepPickupDateTime) AS monthName
    ,paymentType
    ,count(*) as num
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://datalakeytaletu.dfs.core.windows.net/yellowtaxi/nyc/delta/puYear=2015/**',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
GROUP BY paymentType, DATENAME(MONTH, tpepPickupDateTime)
ORDER BY num DESC;
/*
Statement ID: {3C7C567F-CC02-4970-905B-AD76922A6CC9} | Query hash: 0x2CE30D7899EBE262 | Distributed request ID: {BE79CC69-AFCD-413D-97D3-719DB0A51DB9}. Total size of data scanned is 1134 megabytes, total size of data moved is 1608 megabytes, total size of data written is 0 megabytes.
(59 records affected)

Total execution time: 00:07:07.694
*/

SELECT DISTINCT
    vendorID
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://datalakeytaletu.dfs.core.windows.net/yellowtaxi/nyc/delta/puYear=2015/**',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result];
/*
Statement ID: {B465DF17-537E-4A14-82B5-6C9556419B98} | Query hash: 0xFA39E48DDF423402 | Distributed request ID: {2E1D34CE-37CB-4F7A-BFE5-6B6040F3A787}. Total size of data scanned is 47 megabytes, total size of data moved is 1 megabytes, total size of data written is 0 megabytes.
(2 records affected)

Total execution time: 00:00:23.359
*/

-- lanciare 3/4 volte
SELECT
    subcategory
    ,COUNT(*) AS num
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://datalakeytaletu.dfs.core.windows.net/sanfranciscofireworkersdata/sanfrancisco/parquet/year=2020/month=03/**',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
GROUP BY subcategory
ORDER BY num DESC;

--------------------------------------------------------------------

SELECT DISTINCT
    subcategory
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://datalakeytaletu.dfs.core.windows.net/sanfranciscofireworkersdata/sanfrancisco/parquet/year=2020/month=03/**',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result];

CREATE PROCEDURE ldw.ctas_renew
AS
    BEGIN
        IF EXISTS (SELECT [name] FROM [sys].[external_tables] WHERE [name] = 'call_2020_agg')
        BEGIN
            DROP EXTERNAL TABLE ldw.call_2020_agg;
        END
        CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE ldw.call_2020_agg
            WITH (
            LOCATION = '2020/',
            DATA_SOURCE = [sanfranciscofireworkers],
            FILE_FORMAT = [parquet]
            ) AS
        SELECT
            DATENAME(MONTH, dateTime) AS monthname
            ,dataType
            ,dataSubtype
            ,subcategory
            ,COUNT(*) AS num
        FROM
            OPENROWSET(
                BULK 'https://datalakeytaletu.dfs.core.windows.net/sanfranciscofireworkersdata/sanfrancisco/parquet/year=2020/month=*/**',
                FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
            ) AS [result]
        GROUP BY DATENAME(MONTH, dateTime), dataType, dataSubtype, subcategory;            
    END;

-- Query che punta al container dove entrano i dati in streaming
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://datalakeytaletu.dfs.core.windows.net/streaming/**',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result];


/*
Creazione di una external table che punta al container streaming, 
dove stanno entrando i dati grazie allo stream analytics job, 
che tramite l'event hub prende i dati che sto richiamando da uno script Python nello Spark pool
*/

-- Creazione external data source
CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [live] WITH (LOCATION = 'abfss://streaming@datalakeytaletu.dfs.core.windows.net/', CREDENTIAL = [SynapseIdentity]);
GO

-- Creazione external table
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE iss.ext_live_position (
	[timestamp] bigint,
	[message] varchar(20),
	[latitude] varchar(20),
	[longitude] varchar(20)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = '/**',
	DATA_SOURCE = [live],
	FILE_FORMAT = [parquet]
	);
GO

-- Il lancio della query, mi fa ritrovare i nuovi record live
SELECT * FROM iss.ext_live_position;

-- creazione vista che punta ai dati di ingresso (che sta leggendo anche la external table)
CREATE VIEW iss.vw_position
AS  
    SELECT *
    FROM
        OPENROWSET(
            BULK 'https://datalakeytaletu.dfs.core.windows.net/iss-position/raw/serverless/parquet/**',
            FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
        ) AS [result];

-- external table creata precedentemente
SELECT * FROM iss.ext_position
/*
Statement ID: {003658F5-4D4B-4323-AF18-1AF87806B862} | Query hash: 0x2A56A01209013C21 | Distributed request ID: {677546CD-1C07-4B9B-9F37-CF0FBD235363}. Total size of data scanned is 1 megabytes, total size of data moved is 1 megabytes, total size of data written is 0 megabytes.
(30 records affected)

Total execution time: 00:00:00.990
*/

-- vista appena creata
SELECT * FROM iss.vw_position

Statement ID: {3651C063-7442-4666-9F4F-35E462CF10DB} | Query hash: 0xD5A7FE4E630A611C | Distributed request ID: {FC9D4F89-0EDA-417F-A3DD-576BBB05C07D}. Total size of data scanned is 1 megabytes, total size of data moved is 1 megabytes, total size of data written is 0 megabytes.
(30 records affected)

Total execution time: 00:00:01.360

from azureml.opendatasets import SanFranciscoSafety

data = SanFranciscoSafety()
df = data.to_spark_dataframe()
# Display 10 rows
display(df.limit(10))
df.printSchema()
from pyspark.sql.functions import lpad, col, month, year, dayofmonth

from azureml.opendatasets import NycTlcYellow
from datetime import datetime
from dateutil import parser

start_date = parser.parse('2010-01-01') 
end_date = parser.parse('2021-12-31')

data = NycTlcYellow(start_date=start_date, end_date=end_date)
df = data.to_spark_dataframe()
# Display 10 rows
display(df.limit(10))

from azure.eventhub import EventHubProducerClient, EventData
from azure.eventhub.exceptions import EventHubError
import json

conn_str='Endpoint=sb://demostreamaletu.servicebus.windows.net/;SharedAccessKeyName=RootManageSharedAccessKey;SharedAccessKey=5TPjI6Oqer8BGbaQCVf/eZ7VX4CB94dbA+AEhHsUmLE=;EntityPath=eventhubdemoaletu'
eventhub_name='eventhubdemoaletu'

producer = EventHubProducerClient.from_connection_string(
    conn_str=conn_str,
    eventhub_name=eventhub_name
)

%%sql

SELECT
    CAST(vendorID AS STRING) AS VendorID
    ,CAST(passengerCount AS INT) AS Passengers
    ,CAST(totalAmount AS NUMERIC(6,2)) AS Amount
    ,CAST(tpepPickupDateTime AS TIMESTAMP) AS PickUpDatetime
    ,CAST(tpepPickupDateTime AS DATE) AS PickUpDate
    ,CAST(tpepDropoffDateTime AS DATE) AS DropOffDate
FROM taxi_vw
LIMIT 5

%%sql

CREATE TABLE taxi.spark_tt_2015
USING DELTA
LOCATION 'abfss://yellowtaxi@datalakeytaletu.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc/delta_timetravel/2015/'
    AS
    SELECT
        CAST(vendorID AS STRING) AS VendorID
        ,CAST(passengerCount AS INT) AS Passengers
        ,CAST(totalAmount AS NUMERIC(6,2)) AS Amount
        ,CAST(tpepPickupDateTime AS TIMESTAMP) AS PickUpDatetime
        ,CAST(tpepPickupDateTime AS DATE) AS PickUpDate
        ,CAST(tpepDropoffDateTime AS DATE) AS DropOffDate
    FROM taxi_vw
### Vedere la vecchia versione della tabella

%%sql

SELECT *
FROM taxi.spark_tt_2015
VERSION AS OF 0
LIMIT 5
### Restore della vecchia tabella prima del x 10 sui passeggeri

%%sql

RESTORE TABLE taxi.spark_tt_2015 TO VERSION AS OF 0
### Possiamo ancora accedere ai dati corretti (abbiamo fatto il restore), ma anche a quelli sbagliati

%%sql

-- sbagliati:
SELECT *
FROM taxi.spark_tt_2015
VERSION AS OF 1
LIMIT 5

from azure.eventhub import EventHubProducerClient, EventData
from azure.eventhub.exceptions import EventHubError
import json
import requests
import time

url = "http://api.open-notify.org/iss-now.json"

while True:
    try:
        response = requests.get(url)
        data = json.loads(response.content)
        # print(data)

        timestamp = data['timestamp']
        message = data['message']
        latitude = data['iss_position']['latitude']
        longitude = data['iss_position']['longitude']

        j = json.dumps({'timestamp': timestamp, 'message': message, 'latitude': latitude, 'longitude': longitude}).encode('utf-8')


        conn_str='Endpoint=sb://demostreamaletu.servicebus.windows.net/;SharedAccessKeyName=RootManageSharedAccessKey;SharedAccessKey=5TPjI6Oqer8BGbaQCVf/eZ7VX4CB94dbA+AEhHsUmLE=;EntityPath=eventhubdemoaletu'
        eventhub_name='eventhubdemoaletu'

        producer = EventHubProducerClient.from_connection_string(
            conn_str=conn_str,
            eventhub_name=eventhub_name
        )

        with producer:
            send_event_data_batch_with_properties(producer,j)

    except Exception as e:
        print(str(e))

    time.sleep(2) # Chiamata alla API ogni 2 secondi
